issue.title: How to get the joint axis in body frame?

content.raw:
Hmm I didn't see the Joint::LocalAxis one, but I tried Joint::GetLocalAxis and the value of that changed as the robot moved. I'll try Joint::LocalAxis and hope that works. Thanks.

As far as the phrasing goes, I feel like what Joint::GetLocalAxis returns isn't what the documentation describes it as. A method called GetLocalAxis, at least to me, leads me to believe it's going to give me 
the joint axis in body frame, which for a 1 dof revolute should be a constant vector.

Also whoops didn't realize I created this w/o signing in.
